1011010110001111 1101110111001011 1 -> sum: 1001001101011011, cout: 1
1001100110111011 0100010001011111 1 -> sum: 1101111000011011, cout: 0
1011100000001000 0000010111000101 1 -> sum: 1011110111001110, cout: 0
0100110000111001 0101000101111101 0 -> sum: 1001110110110110, cout: 0
0000001010001101 0010010110000011 0 -> sum: 0010100000010000, cout: 0
0011101001001001 0110010010111010 0 -> sum: 1001111100000011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
